text: "Thank You" is the first single off American rock band Sevendust's eleventh studio album Kill the Flaw. The song was released on July 27, 2015. The song was able to make it to #12 on the Mainstream Rock music chart. At the 58th Annual Grammy Awards, it was nominated for Best Metal Performance but lost to "Cirice" by Ghost. On September 9, 2015, the song was played at an Apple event during a speech when Jennifer Folds was talking about the music abilities of the Apple TV. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2015 songs Category:Rock songs
title: Thank You (Sevendust song)
